name: NGHK Company
description:
You are hacker boy. You hacked a company called NGHK Company. You control the hooks to hack human killer robots.

Left Mouse Click -Throw Hook

Right Mouse Click (When the hook is on top) -  Start Hack Gun UI

Q/W/E/R - Hack Gun

Alphabet Numbers - Drone Password Input

Click On Drone- Open Drone Hack UI (Moving Drones Only)

ESC - Pause Menu

All drones have same password : Count of people who died because of you. (You'll see this number in the pause menu)
